# tds-badge



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                 | Type           | Default |
| -------- | --------- | --------------------------- | -------------- | ------- |
| `hidden` | `hidden`  | Changes visibility of badge | `boolean`      | `false` |
| `size`   | `size`    | Sets component size.        | `"lg" \| "sm"` | `'lg'`  |
| `value`  | `value`   | Value shown in badge        | `string`       | `''`    |
